TEXT: A bounty hunter that is seemingly unaware of their own mortality. NL Takes massive risks to fulfil their destiny - there's always another life.
You feel lucky to still have a life remaining. NL You unsheath your claws...

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~furry~ ~one,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
